original_text: Lift up thine eyes unto the high places, and see where thou hast not been lien with. In the ways hast thou sat for them, as the Arabian in the wilderness; and thou hast polluted the land with thy whoredoms and with thy wickedness.
korean_text: 네 눈을 들어 헐벗은 산을 보라 네가 행음하지 아니한 곳이 어디 있느냐 네가 길 가에 앉아 사람들을 기다린 것이 광야에 있는 아라바 사람 같아서 음란과 행악으로 이 땅을 더럽혔도다

sentences.original_text: Lift up thine eyes unto the high places
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 눈을 높은 곳으로 들어 올려라

sentences.original_text: and see where thou hast not been lien with
In the ways hast thou sat for them
as an Arabian in the wilderness
and thou hast polluted the land
with thy whoredoms and with thy wickedness
